summary.span: 一个抽象接口类，它用于指示 SDK 解析程序是成功还是失败。

span.span: An abstract interface class to indicate SDK resolver success or failure.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中指定的已解析 SDK 路径以外的其他路径。

span.span: Gets or sets additional resolved SDK paths beyond the one specified in .

remarks.span: 这允许 SDK 解析程序返回多个 SDK 路径，这些路径将全部导入。

span.span: This allows an SDK resolver to return multiple SDK paths, which will all be imported.
